pages.title: Creating Life
pages.text: It has always been the dream of people to create artificial life.$(br2)Since you are now dealing with magical gems yourself, which seem to have magical powers, this should be a piece of cake.

The raw magical powers, which are bundled by the gems, are the best starting point for such research.$(br2)Since you seem to be immortal, you have all the time in the world to think about it.$(br)(last time a green pig walking upright surprised you, you woke up in your bed the next morning)$(br2)It's time for... experiments!
